name: The Window Men's & Ladies Tees
description:
Raglan $34.90 Ladies Scoop Neck $29.90

This original Nzkat Designs artwork is screenprinted on either a superior quality navy blue and white raglan tee, or a white Ladies' Scoop Neck Tee. These raglan tees also feature 3/4 length sleeves for that 'rolled up' look, as well as a longer style slightly curved front and back bottom hem. Made to give a streamlined shape without being clingy, these tees look and feel amazing on. These are the ultimate in achieving effortless style.

Male model pictured wearing a size Medium. Female size 10 model is pictured wearing a Small.
-------------------------------------
Not sure about size? Can't see your size in stock? Drop us an email and we will give you a hand finding what you're after!

name: 'Dusk' and 'Dawn' Tshirt Dresses
description:
Made of the finest Jersey Cotton, these dresses are a flattering fit that can be worn on its own or layered over leggings or skinny jeans in the cooler months. Featuring an original screenprinted Nzkat artwork, this dress is not just super cute, but also extremely comfy and soft on the skin. It is looser fitting in the mid section and hugs slightly around the hips. It is a raw edge cut, and can be adjusted to be a little shorter or longer as desired. 

Available in Dusk (Charcoal) or Dawn (White & Grey Marle)

Model is an AUS Size 8 and wears a Small.
-------------------------------------

name: American Apparel Lycra Leggings
description:
Lyrca Leggings by American Apparel. Made in USA, sweatshop free.
Unbeatable quality, amazing fit and durability. They are resilient and hold their colour and shape extremely well. They are shiny, super comfy and generally fantastic. 

Available in Black, Charcoal (Steel), Cobalt (Dark Blue) and Fuchsia. Sizes are limited.

These tights usually retail in Australia from upwards of $55 a pair. We are offering a heavily reduced price to move our stock. You won't find these cheaper anywhere.

Approximate sizing is as follows:

XSmall - AUS Size 6 - 8
Small - AUS Size 10
Medium - AUS Size 12
Large - AUS Size 14
